text: 20|131|Arau tumi tomara ducaku ketiya'o prasaraita nakaraiba se'iborara prati, yibora ami bibhinna sraenika parthira jiranara saundaryasbaraupa upabhogara upakarana hicape pradana karaicho, se'iborara dbaraa sihamtaka paraiksa karaara babe. Arau tomara pratipalake diya jiraika'i sarbotkrsta arau adhika sthayi.
